Package de.aicard.services

Class LearnSetService

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.services.LearnSetService
@Service
public class LearnSetService
extends java.lang.Object
handles creations, deletions of learnsets and LearnSetRepository calls
Author:
Clemens Berger, Daniel Michel, Martin Kuehlborn
